data.message: Cool that you shouting out. You're ONE of the greatest...if you didn't ban MGK of shade 45 I'd say you're the greatest but cmon dawg lol...petty just cause he called your daughter good lookin.

replies.message: I did not see his coment.. but I doubt he said "good looking"...
Either way, all the shit Eminem talks he should have a little thicker skin.  If it's to keep his daughter away, you know what they say about forbidden fruit.

He said she was "hot as fuck, in the most respectful way possible because em is king". I think anyone who talks about Em's daughter even in a slightly  disrespectful way such as mgk did, I'd be mad too. She was 16 when he tweeted it and he was 21. So yeah, I'd be mad too.
